ygData.subject: Re: The Battle Continues
ygData.msgSnippet: For your information, Robo, Hunter is a Maximal, not an Alliance member. ... Killfest raises an eyebrow. An Alliance bot attacked four fully- armed warriors?

For your information, Robo, Hunter is a Maximal, not an Alliance 
member.

::Killfest/Darkmouse::

Killfest raises an eyebrow. "An Alliance bot attacked four fully-
armed warriors? He must have been insane."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Darkmouse looks at Dollen, a bit concerned. "You allright?" She asks, 
reffering to his wounds.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon::
> 
> He turns to Iron Raptor.
> "If we end up needing to pull out, my base is fully functional, and 
will
> be able to hold us."
> 
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> With this confrontation with Dark Pri... no, Optimus Prime over, he
> transformes to car mode and heads back to the CF.
> 
> ::Demolition::
> 
> He still followed Unitron and the others around, looking for the 
place
> that will be best to destroy the CF.
> 
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He transformed back to bot mode, and walked to Killfest and Dark 
Fate.
> "Scorponok and the ladies had a run in with a Alliance bot. But its
> taken care of, and he proceding to the base."
> 
> ::Dollen::
> 
> It was hard to get into the tunnel with his wounds. He barely made 
it in
> before it was closed off. He walked besides Dark Mouse.
